posts.post_content:
I think this is the most appropriate place for this thread...

I'd like to purchase as much of a complete set as possible of VCBC mag at one time. Does anyone have a set (or near complete set) that they'd be willing to sell?

If you go to ebay and search for "vcbc", you should be able to find a near-set or two, or perhaps a complete set.

I just bought my complete set of all 38 issues a couple of months ago on ebay.


Steve
